sys_email_canned_message.body:
NORCAL SPECIALTY INSURANCE COMPANY

Date:${date}

 

PERSONAL & CONFIDENTIAL

Policy No: ${policy}

RE:

Norcal Specialty File No.

​(formerly known as PMSLIC)

 

Dear:

This letter will confirm that your coverage limit of $25,000 for this matter has now been exhausted. If you have not yet done so, you should make arrangements for your continued representation with your defense attorney in case there is any further activity. We will now close our file. In the event you receive any correspondence or communication related to a potential medical malpractice action arising from this matter, please contact this office immediately as other coverages may apply.

This letter will confirm that your coverage limit of $30,000 for this matter has now been exhausted. If you have not yet done so, you should make arrangements for your continuedrepresentation with your defense attorney in case there is any further activity. We will now close our file. In the event you receive any correspondence or communication related to a potential medical malpractice action arising from this matter, please contact this office immediately as other coverages may apply.

 

This letter will confirm that your coverage limit of $50,000 for this matter has now been exhausted. If you have not yet done so, you should make arrangements for your continuedrepresentation with your defense attorney in case there is any further activity. We will now close our file. In the event you receive any correspondence or communication related to a potential medical malpractice action arising from this matter, please contact this office immediately as other coverages may apply.

This letter will confirm that this matter has been resolved. We will now close our file. In the event you receive any correspondence or communication related to a potential medical malpractice action arising from this matter, please contact this office immediately as other coverages may apply.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to call this office.

Very truly yours,

cc: 1700 BENT CREEK BOULEVARD, P.O. BOX 2080, MECHANICSBURG, PA 17050-0787  T 844.4NORCAL F 717.796.8080 NORCAL-GROUP.COM
